00036 /*  To add a variable, increase NOVARS (in init.h)  */
00037 /*  then add information to struct vardesc (below) */
00038 //BX  31AUG07  added missing value - last fields
00039 //BX  31OCT07  Changed some variables to double precision (needed for restart)
00040 //BX           All variables were float ('f') before
00041 //BX           This is a bug fix as memory restrictions do not allow to create
00042 //BX           a separate vardesc field for restarts.
00043 
00044 //BX-a
00045 //BX  missing values are set here and to the same value in "vars" declaration
00046 //BX  they will be written on their respective mn_ fields with mult_.._mv calls
00047 //HF the parameter and the macro need to be the same!
00048 const double misval = -1.e+6;
00049 #define MISVAL -1.e+6
00050

00498   int varmap[NOVARS];
00499   int itts;     /* tracer time step counter */
00500   FILE *fn;
00501   char output_filename[200];
00502   double wrts;
00503   int nvar = 0, cdfid, timeid[2];
00504   size_t nrec = 0;
00505 #endif
00506 
00507 int cfc11nrecs,cfc12nrecs,sf6nrecs;
00508 
00509 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*
00510  *
00511  *     begin main executable
00512  *
00513  *-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00514 
00515 int main(void)
00516 {
00517   double inmon,tmon;
00518   double mon,nxt,lst;
00519   double *iyr;
00520   double *nyr;
00521   double dyr,day;
00522   double ndyr;
00523   double *dy;
00524   double dmon[12];
00525   double dbmon;
00526   int imon,inxt,ilst;
00527 # ifndef WRTTS
00528   int itts;     /* tracer time step counter */
00529 # endif
00530   int nmnfirst;
00531 #ifdef SEPFILES
00532   double smon,snxt;
00533   int ismon,isnxt;
00534 #endif
00535 /* Begin edit DT */
00536 # ifdef TTDEST
00537   estTTD=1;
00538 # endif
00539 # ifndef TTDEST
00540   estTTD=0;
00541 # endif
00542 /*  End edit DT  */
00543 
00544 #ifndef WRTTS
00545   size_t nrec = 0;
00546 #endif
00547   int err, i, j, k;
00548   int cmon;
00549   int nmn;
00550   double frac;
00551   static int m;
00552 #ifndef WRTTS
00553   int varmap[NOVARS];
00554 
00555   FILE *fn;
00556   char output_filename[200];
00557 #endif
00558   char run_name[200];
00559   char restart_filename[200];
00560   struct vardesc var_out[NOVARS];
00561 #ifndef WRTTS
00562   struct varcdfinfo varinfo[NOVARS];
00563   int nvar = 0, cdfid, timeid[2];
00564 #endif
00565 
00566   extern int flags[NOVARS];
00567   extern int rflags[NOVARS];
00568 
00569 //BX-a  for testing only
00570   int status;
00571   char message[144];
00572 //BX-e
00573 
00574 //BX  allocate tracer fields
00575   err = alloc_arrays();
00576   if (err) printf("Error allocating arrays.\n");
00577 
00578   err = alloc_trac();
00579   if (err) printf("Error allocating tracer field.\n");
00580 
00581   iyr = malloc(sizeof(double));
00582   nyr =  malloc(sizeof(double));
00583   dy  = malloc(sizeof(double));
00584 
00585         mlen[0] =31;    /* January      */
00586         mlen[1] =28;    /* February     */
00587         mlen[2] =31;    /* March        */
00588         mlen[3] =30;    /* April        */
00589         mlen[4] =31;    /* May          */
00590         mlen[5] =30;    /* June         */
00591         mlen[6] =31;    /* July         */
00592         mlen[7] =31;    /* August       */
00593         mlen[8] =30;    /* September    */
00594         mlen[9] =31;    /* October      */
00595         mlen[10]=30;    /* November     */
00596         mlen[11]=31;    /* December     */
00597 
00598         dmon[0]=0.0;
00599 
00600         for (i=1;i<=11;i++) {
00601           dmon[i] = dmon[i-1] + mlen[i-1];
00602         }
00603 
00604 
00605 /*----------------------------------*
00606  *
00607  *     get user input
00608  *
00609  *----------------------------------*/
00610 
00611 
00612   {
00613     char line[100];
00614     int scan_count, done=1;
00615 
00616     printf("Enter directory to use to read.\n");
00617     fgets(directory,sizeof(directory),stdin);
00618 
00619     directory[strlen(directory)-1] = '\0';
00620     k = strlen(directory);
00621     if (k > 0) if (directory[k-1] != '/') {
00622       directory[k] = '/'; directory[k+1] = '\0';
00623       printf("Using directory %s first.\n",directory);
00624     }
00625 
00626    strcat(directory,fname);
00627    strcpy(fname,directory);
00628    printf("file path = %s\n",fname);
00629 
00630 
00631    while (done) {
00632 
00633      printf("\nEnter the starting month and the total months to integrate.\n");
00634      
00635      fgets(line,sizeof(line),stdin);
00636      line[strlen(line)-1] = '\0';
00637      scan_count = sscanf(line,"%lg, %lg,",&inmon, &tmon);
00638      if (scan_count == 2) {
00639        if (inmon < 0  || tmon < 0)
00640          printf("Negative values not allowed\n");
00641        else done = 0;
00642      }
00643      else printf("Incorrect number of values, %d, read.\n",scan_count);
00644    }
00645    
00646    printf("\ninitial month = %g \n",inmon);
00647    printf("final month = %g \n",inmon+tmon-1);
00648    printf("total months = %g \n\n",tmon);
00649    
00650 
00651 /*-----------------------------------
00652  *
00653  *     set output print flags to 0
00654  *
00655  *     added restart flags as a restart bug fix until 
00656  *     memory restriction problem is solved 31OCT07 BX
00657  *
00658  *----------------------------------*/
00659 
00660     for (i=0;i<=NOVARS-1;i++) flags[i] = 0;
00661     for (i=0;i<=NOVARS-1;i++) rflags[i] = 0;
00662 
00663     flags[1]=0; flags[2]=0;             /* u,v */
00664     rflags[1]=0; rflags[2]=0;           /* u,v */
00665     flags[0]=1; flags[3]=1;             /* D, h */
00666     rflags[0]=0; rflags[3]=1;             /* D, h */
00667     flags[4]=0; flags[5]=0;             /* uhtm, vhtm */
00668     rflags[4]=0; rflags[5]=0;             /* uhtm, vhtm */
00669     flags[6]=0; flags[7]=0; flags[8]=0; /* ea, eb, eaml */
00670 #ifdef ENTRAIN
00671     rflags[6]=1; rflags[7]=1; rflags[8]=1; /* ea, eb, eaml */
00672 #endif
00673     flags[18]=0;                        /* ML potential density */
00674     rflags[18]=0;                       /* ML potential density */
00675 #ifdef INERT
00676     flags[28]=1;  rflags[28]=1;         /* inert1 */
00677     flags[29]=1;  rflags[29]=1;         /* inert2 */
00678 #endif
00679 #ifdef AGE
00680     flags[9]=0;  rflags[9]=1;           /* ideal age tracer*/
00681 # if defined (AGE2) || defined (AGE3)
00682     flags[30]=1;  rflags[30]=0;         /* alk tracer used for hnew field*/
00683 # endif
00684 #endif
00685 
00686 #ifdef OXYGEN
00687     flags[10]=1;  rflags[10]=1;         /* oxygen tracer */
00688     flags[11]=1;  rflags[11]=0;         /* oxygen saturation */
00689     flags[12]=1;  rflags[12]=0;         /* oxygen source-sink */
00690     flags[13]=1;  rflags[13]=0;         /* oxygen fluxed into ML */
00691 #endif
00692 #ifdef OXY18
00693     flags[25]=1;  rflags[25]=1;         /* oxygen 18 tracer */
00694     flags[26]=0;  rflags[26]=0;         /* oxygen 18 source-sink */
00695 #endif
00696 
00697 #ifdef CFC
00698     flags[14]=1;  rflags[14]=1;         /* cfc11 tracer */
00699     flags[15]=1;  rflags[15]=1;         /* cfc12 tracer */
00700     flags[16]=0;  rflags[16]=0;         /* cfc11 fluxed into ML */
00701     flags[17]=0;  rflags[17]=0;         /* cfc12 fluxed into ML */
00702 #endif
00703 
00704 // begin ashao
00705 #ifdef SF6
00706     flags[50]=1;  rflags[50]=1;         /* sf6 tracer */
00707     flags[51]=0;  rflags[51]=0;         /* sf6 fluxed into ML */
00708 #endif
00709 // end ashao
00710 
00711 #ifdef PHOSPHATE
00712     flags[19]=1;  rflags[19]=1;         /* phosphate tracer */
00713     flags[22]=1;  rflags[22]=1;         /* dop tracer */
00714     flags[24]=1;  rflags[24]=0;         /* pop flux */
00715     flags[27]=1;  rflags[27]=0;         /* po4 obs */
00716 #endif
00717 
00718 #ifdef NITRATE
00719     flags[20]=1;  rflags[20]=1;         /* nitrate tracer */
00720     flags[23]=1;  rflags[23]=1;         /* don tracer */
00721 # ifdef N15_CYCLE
00722     flags[39]=1;  rflags[39]=1;         /* nitrate tracer 15N*/
00723     flags[40]=1;  rflags[40]=1;         /* don tracer 15N */
00724 # endif
00725 #endif /* NITRATE */
00726 #ifdef DIC
00727     flags[21]=1;  rflags[21]=1;         /* dic tracer */
00728     flags[31]=1;  rflags[31]=1;         /* alk tracer */
00729     flags[32]=1;  rflags[32]=0;         /* air-sea co2 flux */
00730     flags[48]=1;  rflags[48]=0;         /* dic flux */
00731     flags[49]=1;  rflags[49]=0;         /* surface pco2 */
00732 #endif
00733 
00734 #ifdef PHOSPHATE
00735     flags[33]=1;  rflags[33]=0;         /* po4 flux */
00736 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
00737     flags[34]=1;  rflags[34]=0;         /* temperature */
00738     flags[35]=1;  rflags[35]=0;         /* light limitation of po4 prod. */
00739 #  ifdef NITRATE
00740     flags[36]=1;  rflags[36]=0;         /* nitrate limitation of po4 prod. */
00741 #  endif
00742     flags[37]=1;  rflags[37]=0;         /* iron limitation of po4 prod. */
00743 # endif /* PROGNOSTIC */
00744 #endif /* PHOSPHATE */
00745 #ifdef NITRATE
00746     flags[38]=1;  rflags[38]=0;         /* no3 flux */
00747     flags[42]=1;  rflags[42]=0;         /* pon flux */
00748     flags[43]=1;  rflags[43]=0;         /* no3 obs */
00749     flags[45]=1;  rflags[45]=0;         /* n2 fixation */
00750     flags[46]=1;  rflags[46]=0;         /* denitrification */
00751     flags[47]=1;  rflags[47]=0;         /* sed. denitrification */
00752 # ifdef N15_CYCLE
00753     flags[41]=1;  rflags[41]=0;         /* no3_15n flux */
00754     flags[44]=1;  rflags[44]=0;         /* pon_15n flux */
00755 # endif
00756 #endif /* NITRATE */
00757 
00758         printf("Enter base name for output\n");
00759 
00760     fgets(run_name,sizeof(run_name),stdin);
00761     run_name[strlen(run_name)-1] = '\0';
00762     sprintf(output_filename,"%s.%04g.nc",run_name,inmon+tmon-1);
00763     printf("Create NetCDF output file '%s'.\n",output_filename);
00764 
00765 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
00766    //HF
00767    do {
00768      printf("Do you want to use the default values for the prognostic model?\n");
00769      printf("Enter \"0\" for 'NO' or a positive number for 'YES'.\n");
00770      fgets(line,sizeof(line),stdin);
00771      printf("read:%s<--\n", line);
00772      scan_count = sscanf(line, "%d", &use_default_progn);
00773      if (scan_count < 1)
00774        printf("Please enter an integer number!\n");
00775      else
00776        done = 1;
00777    } while (! done);
00778 
00779    if (! use_default_progn) {
00780      // get value for lambda0
00781      done = 0;
00782      do {
00783        printf("Please enter the value for lambda0 [mol/(m3 y)] (default=3e-3):\n");
00784        fgets(line,sizeof(line),stdin);
00785        scan_count = sscanf(line, "%lg", &lambda0);
00786        if (scan_count < 1 || lambda0 <= 0.0) {
00787 #ifdef INTERACTIVE
00788          printf("Please enter a positive number!\n");
00789 #else
00790          lambda0 = 0;
00791          done = 1;
00792 #endif
00793        } else {
00794          lambda0 /= (365.0 * 86400.0); // convert to mol/(m3 s)
00795          done = 1;
00796        }
00797      } while (! done);
00798      // get value for k_I
00799      done = 0;
00800      do {
00801        printf("Please enter the value for k_I [W/m2] (default=50):\n");
00802        fgets(line,sizeof(line),stdin);
00803        scan_count = sscanf(line, "%lg", &k_I);
00804        if (scan_count < 1 || k_I <= 0.0) {
00805 #ifdef INTERACTIVE
00806          printf("Please enter a positive number!\n");
00807 #else
00808          k_I = 0;
00809          done = 1;
00810 #endif
00811        } else
00812          done = 1;       
00813      } while (! done);
00814      // get value for par_b
00815      done = 0;
00816      do {
00817        printf("Please enter the value for par_b [1/dgC] (default=0.04):\n");
00818        fgets(line,sizeof(line),stdin);
00819        scan_count = sscanf(line, "%lg", &par_b);
00820        if (scan_count < 1 || par_b <= 0.0) {
00821 #ifdef INTERACTIVE
00822          printf("Please enter a positive number!\n");
00823 #else
00824          par_b = 0;
00825          done = 1;
00826 #endif
00827        } else
00828          done = 1;       
00829      } while (! done);
00830      // get value for k_PO4
00831      done = 0;
00832      do {
00833        printf("Please enter the value for k_PO4 [mol/m3] (default=0.2e-3):\n");
00834        fgets(line,sizeof(line),stdin);
00835        scan_count = sscanf(line, "%lg", &k_PO4);
00836        if (scan_count < 1 || k_PO4 <= 0.0) {
00837 #ifdef INTERACTIVE
00838          printf("Please enter a positive number!\n");
00839 #else
00840          k_PO4 = 0;
00841          done = 1;
00842 #endif
00843        } else
00844          done = 1;       
00845      } while (! done);
00846      // get value for k_Fe
00847      done = 0;
00848      do {
00849        printf("Please enter the value for k_Fe [mol/m3] (default=0.2e-6):\n");
00850        fgets(line,sizeof(line),stdin);
00851        scan_count = sscanf(line, "%lg", &k_Fe);
00852        if (scan_count < 1 || k_Fe <= 0.0) {
00853 #ifdef INTERACTIVE
00854          printf("Please enter a positive number!\n");
00855 #else
00856          k_Fe = 0;
00857          done = 1;
00858 #endif
00859        } else
00860          done = 1;       
00861      } while (! done);
00862    } else {
00863      // set default values
00864      lambda0 = 3e-3 / (365.0 * 86400.0); // mol/(m3 s)
00865      k_I = 50.0; // W/m2
00866      par_b = 0.04; // 1/dgC
00867      k_PO4 = 0.1e-3; // mol/m3
00868      k_Fe = 0.2e-6; // mol/m3
00869    }
00870    printf("----- Parameter for prognostic model:\n\n");
00871    printf("lambda0=%g\n",lambda0);
00872    printf("k_I=%g\n",k_I);
00873    printf("par_b=%g\n",par_b);
00874    printf("k_PO4=%g\n",k_PO4);
00875    printf("\n-------------------------------------\n\n");
00876    //HF-e
00877 # endif
00878 
00879   } // end of block "get user input"
00880 
00881 //DT
00882   lastsave=-1;
00883 //DT
00884 
00885 /*-----------------------------------
00886  *
00887  *     allocate and initialize fields
00888  *
00889  *----------------------------------*/
00890 
00891     read_grid();
00892     printf("Done reading grid or metric file.\n");
00893 
00894     set_metrics();
00895     printf("Done setting metrics.\n");
00896 // begin ashao
00897 # ifdef SF6
00898 
00899     sf6nrecs=read_trac(sf6sc_coeffs, sf6sol_coeffs, sf6year, sf6N, sf6S);
00900     printf("Read %d records for SF6\n\n",sf6nrecs);
00901 # endif
00902 
00903 # ifdef CFC
00904     cfc11nrecs=read_trac(cfc11sc_coeffs, cfc11sol_coeffs, cfc11year, cfc11N, cfc11S);
00905     printf("Read %d records for CFC-11\n",cfc11nrecs);
00906     cfc12nrecs=read_trac(cfc12sc_coeffs, cfc12sol_coeffs, cfc12year, cfc12N, cfc12S);
00907     printf("Read %d records for CFC-12\n\n",cfc12nrecs);
00908 
00909 # endif
00910 /* Copy the variable descriptions to a list of the actual output variables. */
00911     for (i=0;i<NOVARS;i++) if (flags[i] > 0) {
00912         var_out[nvar] = vars[i]; varmap[i] = nvar; nvar++;
00913     }
00914     // force float precision output with last argument
00915    printf("Making NETCDF %s file\n",output_filename);
00916     create_file(output_filename, NETCDF_FILE, var_out, nvar, &fn, &cdfid, timeid, varinfo, 1);
00917     // don't force
00918     // create_file(output_filename, NETCDF_FILE, var_out, nvar, &fn, &cdfid, timeid, varinfo, 0);
00919     printf("Closing file \n");
00920     close_file(&cdfid, &fn);
00921 
00922 /* Allocate the memory for the fields to be calculated.         */
00923     alloc_fields();
00924 
00925 /* initialize tracer pointers                                   */
00926 
00927   for (m=0;m<NOVARS;m++) {
00928     if (flags[m]) for (k=0;k<varsize[m];k++) var[m][k] = 0.0;
00929   }
00930 
00931 /********** set means to zero                                   */
00932   /*  2d variables */
00933   if (flags[8]) set_fix_darray2d_zero(mn_eaml);
00934 #ifdef CFC

00936 //  if (flags[16]) set_fix_darray2d_zero(mn_c11flux);

00949 #endif

00951 #ifdef SF6

00956   }
00957 #endif
00958 // end ashao
00959 
00960 
00961 #ifdef PHOSPHATE
00962   if (flags[24]) set_fix_darray2d_zero(mn_pflux);

00984 # endif
00985 #endif

01000   if (flags[7]) set_darray3d_zero(mn_eb, NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);

01033 # endif
01034 #endif /* NITRATE */
01035 #ifdef DIC

01037   if (flags[31]) set_darray3d_zero(mn_alk, NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);

01621                 for (j=0;j<NYMEM;j++)
01622                     mn_jpo4[k][i][j] += jpo4[k][i][j];
01623     }

02007 
02008 //   First write the up-to-date tracer values to the mean fields.
02009 //   In order to save memory the instantaneous values for the
02010 //   restart will be written on mean fields in the restart file.
02011 
02012     printf("start of array copying\n");
02013 
02014 #ifdef ENTRAIN
02015     copy_fix_darray2d(mn_eaml, eaml);
02016 #endif
02017 #ifdef ENTRAIN
02018     copy_darray3d(mn_ea, ea, NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);

02020 #endif
02021     //HF #ifdef SMOOTH_REST

02023     //HF #endif

02026 #endif
02027 #ifdef PHOSPHATE
02028     copy_darray3d(mn_phos, tr[mPHOSPHATE], NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);
02029     copy_darray3d(mn_dop, tr[mDOP], NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);
02030 #endif
02031 #ifdef NITRATE
02032     copy_darray3d(mn_nitr, tr[mNITRATE], NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);
02033     copy_darray3d(mn_don, tr[mDON], NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);
02034 # ifdef N15_CYCLE
02035     copy_darray3d(mn_nitr_15n, tr[mNITRATE_15n], NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);
02036     copy_darray3d(mn_don_15n, tr[mDON_15n], NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);
02037 # endif
02038 #endif /* NITRATE */
02039 #ifdef DIC
02040     for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
02041         for (i=0;i<NXMEM;i++)
02042             for (j=0;j<NYMEM;j++) {
02043                 mn_dic[k][i][j] = dic[k][i][j];
02044                 mn_alk[k][i][j] = alk[k][i][j];
02045             }
02046 #endif
02047 #ifdef AGE
02048     copy_darray3d(mn_age, age, NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);
02049 #endif
02050     for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
02051         for (i=0;i<NXMEM;i++) {
02052             for (j=0;j<NYMEM;j++) {
02053 #ifdef INERT
02054                 mn_inert1[k][i][j] = inert1[k][i][j];
02055                 mn_inert2[k][i][j] = inert2[k][i][j];
02056 #endif
02057 #ifdef OXY18
02058           mn_o18[k][i][j] = o18[k][i][j];
02059 #endif
02060 #ifdef CFC
02061           mn_cfc11[k][i][j] = cfc11[k][i][j];
02062           mn_cfc12[k][i][j] = cfc12[k][i][j];
02063 #endif
02064 // begin ashao
02065 #ifdef SF6
02066           mn_sf6[k][i][j] = sf6[k][i][j];
02067 #endif
02068 // end ashao
02069         } /* for j loop */
02070       }   /* for i loop */
02071     }     /* for k loop */
02072     
02073 //  Second, create restart file name and open file
02074 
02075         sprintf(restart_filename,"restart.%s.%04d.nc",run_name,cmon);
02076         printf("Writing NetCDF restart file '%s'.\n\n",restart_filename);
02077 
02078 /* Copy the variable descriptions to a list of the actual restart variables. */
02079         nvar = 0;
02080         for (i=0;i<NOVARS;i++) if (rflags[i] > 0) {
02081             var_out[nvar] = vars[i]; varmap[i] = nvar; nvar++;
02082         }
02083 
02084 // do NOT force float precision output with last argument
02085         create_file(restart_filename, NETCDF_FILE, var_out, nvar, &fn, &cdfid, timeid, varinfo, 0);
02086 
02087         for (m=0;m<NOVARS;m++) if (rflags[m]) {
02088           err = write_field(cdfid, fn, vars[m], varinfo[varmap[m]], 
02089                              0,var[m]);
02090           if (err == -1) printf("Error writing %s.\n",vars[m].name);
02091         }
02092 
02093         close_file(&cdfid, &fn);
02094 
02095   printf("\n programme termine normallement. \n");
02096   return(0);
02097 }

02100  *
02101  *     begin subroutines
02102  *                                                                   *
02103  *-------------------------------------------------------------------*/

02446 }

02448 
02449 void alloc_fields(void) {
02450 
02451   int m;
02452 
02453   extern double *var[NOVARS];
02454   extern double junk[(NZ+1)*(NXMEM)*(NYMEM)];
02455   extern long varsize[NOVARS];
02456   extern int flags[NOVARS];
02457 
02458   for (m=0;m<NOVARS;m++) {
02459 
02460     //HF if ( m>3 )    {
02461     //HF: added mn_h
02462       if ( m>=3 )    {
02463        switch (vars[m].z_grid) {
02464         case 'L': varsize[m] = NZ*(NXMEM)*(NYMEM); break;
02465         case 'i': varsize[m] = (NZ+1)*(NXMEM)*(NYMEM); break;
02466         case '2': varsize[m] = 2*(NXMEM)*(NYMEM); break;
02467         case '1': varsize[m] = (NXMEM)*(NYMEM); break;
02468         default: printf("Unknown layer axis[%d] %c.\n",m,vars[m].z_grid);
02469       }
02470 
02471       var[m] = calloc((size_t) varsize[m], sizeof(double));
02472       if (var[m] == NULL) { 
02473          printf("Unable to allocate memory for var[%d].\n",m);
02474          exit(-21); 
02475       }
02476 
02477 //      temporarily disabling this output
02478 //      printf("Allocated memory for var[%d],%s.\n\n",m,vars[m].name); 
02479 
02480     }
02481     else { var[m] = junk; varsize[m] = 0; }
02482   }
02483 
02484   var[0] = &D[0][0];
02485   var[1] = &mn_u[0][0][0];
02486   var[2] = &mn_v[0][0][0];
02487   var[3] = &mn_h[0][0][0];
02488   var[4] = &mn_uhtm[0][0][0];
02489   var[5] = &mn_vhtm[0][0][0];
02490   var[6] = &mn_ea[0][0][0];
02491   var[7] = &mn_eb[0][0][0];
02492   var[8] = &mn_eaml[0][0];
02493   var[18] = &mn_rml[0][0][0];
02494 
02495 #ifdef INERT
02496   var[28] = &mn_inert1[0][0][0];
02497   var[29] = &mn_inert2[0][0][0];
02498 #endif
02499 #ifdef AGE
02500   var[9] = &mn_age[0][0][0];
02501 # if defined AGE2 || defined AGE3
02502   var[30] = &mn_hnew[0][0][0];
02503 # endif
02504 #endif
02505 
02506 #ifdef OXYGEN
02507   var[10] = &mn_oxygen[0][0][0];
02508   var[11] = &mn_o2sat[0][0][0];
02509   var[12] = &mn_jo2[0][0][0];
02510   var[13] = &mn_oxyflux[0][0];
02511 #endif
02512 #ifdef OXY18
02513   var[25] = &mn_o18[0][0][0];
02514   var[26] = &mn_jo18[0][0][0];
02515 #endif
02516 
02517 #ifdef CFC
02518   var[14] = &mn_cfc11[0][0][0];
02519   var[15] = &mn_cfc12[0][0][0];
02520   var[16] = &mn_c11flux[0][0];
02521   var[17] = &mn_c12flux[0][0];
02522 #endif
02523 
02524 // begin ashao
02525 #ifdef SF6
02526   var[50] = &mn_sf6[0][0][0];
02527   var[51] = &mn_sf6flux[0][0];
02528 #endif
02529 // end ashao
02530 #ifdef PHOSPHATE
02531   var[19] = &mn_phos[0][0][0];
02532   var[22] = &mn_dop[0][0][0];
02533   var[24] = &mn_pflux[0][0];
02534   var[27] = &mn_pobs[0][0][0];
02535   var[33] = &mn_jpo4[0][0][0];
02536 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
02537   var[34] = &Temptm[0][0][0];
02538   var[35] = &mn_lightlim[0][0][0];
02539 #  ifdef NITRATE
02540   var[36] = &mn_nitrlim[0][0][0];
02541 #  endif
02542   var[37] = &mn_ironlim[0][0][0];
02543 # endif /* PROGNOSTIC */
02544 #endif /* PHOSPHATE */
02545 #ifdef NITRATE
02546   var[20] = &mn_nitr[0][0][0];
02547   var[23] = &mn_don[0][0][0];
02548   var[38] = &mn_jno3[0][0][0];
02549   var[42] = &mn_nflux[0][0];
02550   var[43] = &mn_nobs[0][0][0];
02551   var[45] = &mn_n2fix[0][0][0];
02552   var[46] = &mn_denitw[0][0][0];
02553   var[47] = &mn_denits[0][0][0];
02554 # ifdef N15_CYCLE
02555   var[39] = &mn_nitr_15n[0][0][0];
02556   var[40] = &mn_don_15n[0][0][0];
02557   var[41] = &mn_jno3_15n[0][0][0];
02558   var[44] = &mn_nflux_15n[0][0];
02559 # endif
02560 #endif /* NITRATE */
02561 #ifdef DIC
02562   var[21] = &mn_dic[0][0][0];
02563   var[31] = &mn_alk[0][0][0];
